OCD.name: Map of Science via 554 Fields (Circle Annotations)
OCD.description: Locate records tagged with a UCSD class (one of the 554 subdisciplines) on the UCSD Map of Science

AD.name: Subtitle
AD.description: The subtitle text printed below the title of the visualization. Only available for non-simplified layout.

AD.name: UCSD Area
AD.description: Choose the column from your table that gives a UCSD node ID.

AD.name: Other Class
AD.description: Choose the column from your table that labels the record.

AD.name: Value
AD.description: Choose the column from your table that gives the value associated with a UCSD node.

AD.name: Scaling Factor
AD.description: Scale the sizes of all circles by this constant.

AD.name: Simplified Layout?
AD.description: If selected, a simplified graphic will be produced. If not selected, the graphic produced will be suitable for printing and include a title, date, howto, etc.

AD.name: Show Export Window?
AD.description: If selected, a window with the visualization will be shown. It has useful export features if the output file needs to be customized.

OCD.name: Map of Science via Journals
OCD.description: Locate the journals from a table on the UCSD Map of Science

AD.name: Subtitle
AD.description: The subtitle text printed below the title of the visualization. Only available for non-simplified layout.

AD.name: Journal Column
AD.description: Choose a column from your table that gives a journal name, abbreviation, or ISSN (International Standard Serial Number)

AD.name: Scaling Factor
AD.description: Scale the sizes of all circles by this constant.

AD.name: Simplified Layout?
AD.description: If selected, a simplified graphic will be produced. If not selected, the graphic produced will be suitable for printing and include a title, date, howto, etc.

AD.name: Show Export Window?
AD.description: If selected, a window with the visualization will be shown. It has useful export features if the output file needs to be customized.
